properties.name: IsReady
properties.description: Gets whether WebView2 is fully initialized and ready.

properties.name: Source
properties.description: Gets the current source URL or content identifier.

properties.name: ZoomLevel
properties.description: Gets or sets the current zoom level (percentage, e.g., 100 = 100%).

properties.name: TotalPages
properties.description: Gets the total number of pages in the document.

properties.name: IsSearchActive
properties.description: Gets whether a search is currently active.

properties.name: SearchMatchCount
properties.description: Gets the number of search matches found.

methods.name: Navigate
methods.description: Navigate to a URL.

methods.name: LoadHtml
methods.description: Load HTML content directly from a string.

methods.name: LoadFile
methods.description: Load HTML content from a local file path.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The path to the HTML file

methods.name: Refresh
methods.description: Refresh the current page.

methods.name: GoBack
methods.description: Navigate back in history.

methods.name: GoForward
methods.description: Navigate forward in history.

methods.name: CanGoBack
methods.description: Check if back navigation is available.

returns.description: True if back navigation is available

methods.name: CanGoForward
methods.description: Check if forward navigation is available.

returns.description: True if forward navigation is available

methods.name: ZoomIn
methods.description: Zoom in by a specified increment (default 10%).

methods.name: ZoomOut
methods.description: Zoom out by a specified increment (default 10%).

methods.name: ZoomReset
methods.description: Reset zoom to 100%.

methods.name: FitToWidth
methods.description: Fit document width to the viewer width.

methods.name: FitToPage
methods.description: Fit entire page to the viewer.

methods.name: GoToPage
methods.description: Go to a specific page number.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to navigate to (1-based)

methods.name: FirstPage
methods.description: Go to the first page.

methods.name: LastPage
methods.description: Go to the last page.

methods.name: NextPage
methods.description: Go to the next page.

methods.name: PreviousPage
methods.description: Go to the previous page.

methods.name: Search
methods.description: Start a search for the specified text.

methods.name: FindNext
methods.description: Find the next occurrence of the search text.

methods.name: FindPrevious
methods.description: Find the previous occurrence of the search text.

methods.name: ClearSearch
methods.description: Clear the current search and highlights.

methods.name: Print
methods.description: Print the current document using the system print dialog.

methods.name: PrintSilent
methods.description: Print the current document silently to the default printer.

methods.name: PrintPreview
methods.description: Show print preview.

methods.name: ExecuteScript
methods.description: Execute JavaScript code in the current page.

methods.name: PostMessage
methods.description: Post a message to JavaScript. JavaScript can receive via: window.chrome.webview.addEventListener('message', handler)

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to send (string or JSON)

methods.name: GetHtmlContent
methods.description: Get the current document content as HTML.

returns.description: The HTML content of the current document

methods.name: GetTextContent
methods.description: Get the current document content as plain text.

returns.description: The text content of the current document

methods.name: About
methods.description: Displays control name and version information in a MessageBox.

events.name: ControlReady
events.description: Fired when WebView2 is fully initialized and ready for use.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL that was navigated to

events.name: DocumentLoaded
events.description: Fired when the document has finished loading.

events.name: ZoomChanged
events.description: Fired when the zoom level changes.

events.name: PageChanged
events.description: Fired when the current page changes.

events.name: SearchResultsChanged
events.description: Fired when search results are found.
